name: pressure

effect.diamond-pearl: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.platinum: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Does not affect friendly Pokémon's moves that target all other Pokémon. This ability's presence is not announced upon entering battle.

short_effect: Increases the PP cost of moves targetting the Pokémon by one.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.
flavor_text.platinum: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The Pokémon raises the foe’s PP usage.
